titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the production of biodiesel and certain ethanol fuels, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2147-2148)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/25/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a portion of the alcohol fuels credit to offset the tentative minimum tax. Allows an alcohol fuels credit for the production of biodiesel fuel. Excludes from gross income the alcohol fuels credit attributable to biodiesels and certain ethanol-based ethers.
